relatedModules.summary: This module offers a set of APIs that facilitate the transmission of XML requests to a SOAP backend. It excels in managing security policies within SOAP requests, ensuring the transmission of secured SOAP envelopes. Moreover, it possesses the capability to efficiently extract data from security-applied SOAP responses.

This module offers a set of APIs that facilitate the transmission of XML requests to a SOAP 1.1 backend. It excels in managing security policies within SOAP requests, ensuring the transmission of secured SOAP envelopes. Moreover, it possesses the capability to efficiently extract data from security-applied SOAP responses.

This module offers a set of APIs that facilitate the transmission of XML requests to a SOAP 1.2 backend. It excels in managing security policies within SOAP requests, ensuring the transmission of secured SOAP envelopes. Moreover, it possesses the capability to efficiently extract data from security-applied SOAP responses.

fields.name: outboundSecurity
fields.description: Web service security configurations for SOAP requests

fields.name: inboundSecurity
fields.description: Web service security configurations to decrypt and verify SOAP responses

errors.name: Error
errors.description: Defines the common error type for the module.

simpleNameReferenceTypes.name: InboundSecurityConfig
simpleNameReferenceTypes.description: Represents the record for outbound security configurations to verify and decrypt SOAP envelopes.

simpleNameReferenceTypes.name: OutboundSecurityConfig
simpleNameReferenceTypes.description: Union type of all the outbound web service security configurations.

enums.name: CanonicalizationAlgorithm
enums.description: Represents enums for all the supported canonicalization algorithms.

enums.name: DigestAlgorithm
enums.description: Represents enums for all the supported digest algorithms.

enums.name: EncryptionAlgorithm
enums.description: Represents enums for all the supported encryption algorithms.

enums.name: PasswordType
enums.description: Represents enums for all the supported password types.

enums.name: SignatureAlgorithm
enums.description: Represents enums for all the supported signature algorithms.
